title: Kitchen Remodeling Seattle, Cost of Kitchen Remodel
description: Kitchen remodeling in your home, including new cabinet and kitchen countertop installation, is fast, reliable, and budget-friendly.

hero.h1: Seattle Kitchen Remodelers by Renova Contractors LLC
hero.heroP:
- üõ†Ô∏è **11+ years** remodeling Seattle kitchens ‚Äì layouts, cabinets, countertops
- üß∞ **Cabinets**: custom or prefab, we help pick what fits your space & budget
- üíé **Countertops**: quartz, marble, modern durable options ‚Äî you choose, we source

about.phrase1: A kitchen is a good place to be, almost always the best place in the house.
about.phrase2: Happiness is a small house, with a big kitchen.
about.priceLine1: Minor Kitchen Remodel: üç≥ Update cabinets, countertops, and appliances for $15,000-$25,000+. A fresh, modern look without breaking the bank!
about.priceLine2: Major Kitchen Remodel: ü•ò Full overhaul with custom cabinets, high-end appliances, and new layout for $40,000-$70,000+. Create your dream kitchen!
about.image1alt: A utility room with beige cabinetry, a stainless steel sink, and a window bringing in natural light. The countertop is adorned with neatly folded towels and a small potted plant. This space, part of a recent renovation, features a modern, minimalist design with wooden flooring and a closed door.
about.image2alt: A remodeled kitchen features teal cabinetry with black handles, white countertops, and a white farmhouse sink. The backsplash is dark green tile. The room has wood-patterned flooring, recessed lighting, and a large window illuminated by pendant lights.
about.sectionP1: Our fully licensed, bonded, and insured team focuses on meeting your unique needs, whether that‚Äôs custom cabinetry, open floor plans, or high-end finishes. It's our mission that every kitchen be as functional as it is beautiful. From an initial consultation all the way down to a final walk-through, there isn't any minute detail that's left unmentioned. We are first gathering the vision, budget, and goal information provided by you as the foundation necessary toward beginning with the design process and then leading into construction accordingly. Renova Contractors LLC is very strong about transparency, partnership, and successful results each time.
about.sectionP2: There are two major stages: designing your dream kitchen and sourcing high-quality materials. We always aim to maximize the space and make it functional, according to your needs, with everything considered-from custom cabinets down to the countertops. Upon the design approval, we do procurement down to the last minute details, careful sourcing and thorough inspection of materials that would match your style-from flooring to backplash tiles down to fixtures-just to assure it passes the mark. At this point in time, we would then schedule a start date. The actual renovation starts with removal of old fixtures, area prep, followed by plumbing and electrical inspection. We make sure everything is up to code and all required permits are pulled.  Cabinets, countertops, and tiles are installed with precision as this space is transformed into the heart of your home. After the last details, like painting and hardware installation, we do a deep clean and walkthrough with you to make sure your satisfaction is met!
about.section2P1: Kitchen remodel can feel like a daunting task. From potential wiring and plumbing challenges to delays in material delivery, the process might seem overwhelming. That‚Äôs why Renova Contractors LLC has developed a streamlined approach to eliminate these worries. We don‚Äôt rush into the project unprepared; instead, we ensure everything‚Äîfrom cabinets to flooring‚Äîis in place before work begins. Our team pulls permits, prepares the space, and strategizes to avoid delays. By the time materials like countertops, appliances, and lighting arrive, we‚Äôre ready to begin. Throughout the project, we keep you informed with regular updates and communication. If you‚Äôre away, you can monitor progress remotely through our project management tools. RENOVA‚Äôs comprehensive process ensures that your kitchen remodel is stress-free and completed on time.
about.section2P2: Our kitchen remodeling projects typically take 2‚Äì4 weeks for standard remodels with no structural changes and 4‚Äì6 weeks for projects involving major structural adjustments, such as removing a load-bearing wall or reconfiguring layouts. We adhere to a strict schedule, and if we ever fall behind, we offer a $100 discount for every day past the agreed timeline. Renova Contractors LLC prioritizes your satisfaction and strives to deliver exceptional results, ensuring your remodeled kitchen is both beautiful and functional.

about.sectionH1: The proper approach to Kitchen Renovation in Seattle

ourServices.paragraph: We handle everything from full kitchen remodels in Seattle to jobs like countertop replacement or backsplash install. If you're redoing the whole layout, we can bring in a designer for help with basic plans and picking finishes. But you don‚Äôt have to do a full gut ‚Äî we also install kitchen flooring, cabinets, or just update lighting and plumbing. We'll remove your old counters cleanly and swap in quartz, marble, or whatever you picked. Need better lighting over the stove or prep area? We can add under-cabinet lights. Want to hook up a dishwasher or move your kitchen sink? We‚Äôve got licensed plumbers for that too. No pressure ‚Äî just pick what you want done and we‚Äôll do it.

ourServices.ourServicesMarkdown:
RENOVA Contractors LLC handles full kitchen remodels in Seattle ‚Äì from demo to final trim. We don‚Äôt do surface updates or patch jobs. We rebuild kitchens the right way ‚Äì code-compliant, properly vented, leveled, and ready for long-term use.

### What‚Äôs Included:
- üß± **Demo & prep** ‚Äì Remove old cabinets, countertops, flooring, and walls as needed. Prep subfloor, frame, and rough-in for new layout  
- ‚ö° **Electrical upgrades** ‚Äì New circuits for appliances, GFCI outlets, recessed lighting, island power ‚Äì all to NEC standards  
- üîß **Plumbing** ‚Äì Reconfigure sink, dishwasher, or fridge lines. Shutoffs, vents, and waste lines updated to UPC  
- üå¨Ô∏è **HVAC adjustments** ‚Äì Ducting for range hood, makeup air if required, and airflow corrections if layout changes  
- ü™µ **Cabinet installation** ‚Äì Plywood box cabinets from Bellmont, GoldenHome, or custom-built in-shop. Installed level, shimmed, and fastened to studs  
- ü™® **Countertops** ‚Äì Quartz or granite from Pental, MSI, or Daltile. Templated, cut, and installed with proper support and seams  
- üß± **Backsplash & tile work** ‚Äì Installed over cement board or Schluter ‚Äì clean cuts, tight spacing, grouted and sealed  
- üßΩ **Flooring** ‚Äì LVP, tile, or hardwood ‚Äì based on use, slab, and layout  
- üõ†Ô∏è **Finish work** ‚Äì Trim, paint, toe kicks, undercab lighting, and appliance installs

We also include free design support to help pick materials, layout, and finishes before the job starts. All permits are pulled through the **City of Seattle**, and we walk every inspection.

If you‚Äôre looking for a reliable, code-focused kitchen remodeling company in Seattle, **RENOVA Contractors LLC** builds it once ‚Äì and builds it right. ‚úÖüìèüß∞

manufacturers.p: For the most reliable cabinets and eye-catching countertops, be it marble countertops, quartz countertops, the shiniest backsplash tile, or a smooth installation of appliances, we provide you with manufacturers that have proven themselves to be reliable in their respective industries. For kitchen cabinets, we work with Procraft Cabinets, Bellmont Cabinets, Golden Home Cabinets, etc. We procure all of our kitchen appliances from Whirpool, KitchenAid, General Electric, and WOLF, among many others. In all of our products, we search for quality and aesthetics.
manufacturers.markdownmanufacturers:
We don‚Äôt just remodel kitchens ‚Äî we bring the materials too. RENOVA sources and installs everything, so you don‚Äôt have to chase product lists or wait on third parties. Here‚Äôs how we handle materials üëá

### ü™µ Kitchen Cabinets We Use

- **ProCraft** ‚Äì Good for custom kitchen layouts. Soft-close hardware, multiple colors, and fast lead times.  
- **Luban Cabinets** ‚Äì Solid wood frames, no MDF. Looks sharp, holds up better over time.  
- **Bellmont** ‚Äì Higher-end stuff with **lacquered maple**, smooth drawer glides, frameless design.  
- **Golden Home** ‚Äì Budget-friendly modular cabinets. We use these a lot when clients want clean installs without the premium price.  

### ü™® Kitchen Countertops We Install

- **Architectural Surfaces** ‚Äì Modern **luxury quartz**, usually soft matte or neutral veins.  
- **MSI** ‚Äì Solid choice for **granite under $50/sq. ft.**, great for high-traffic kitchens.  
- **Indigo** ‚Äì Bold slabs, dramatic veining ‚Äî good for statement islands or backsplashes.  
- **Cosmos** ‚Äì **Sintered stone**, heat-proof and super durable if you cook a lot.  

### üîß How We Build With It

- We pre-stock most materials. If it's in our local warehouse, install starts in under **72 hours**.  
- Our team handles full **cabinet leveling**, **hardware fitting**, and **seamless countertop edge matching**.  
- You get **lifetime cabinet warranties** and **15-year countertop guarantees** included.

You don‚Äôt have to overspend to get a solid kitchen. With RENOVA, you get builder pricing and install crews that actually know what they‚Äôre doing.

howWeWork.howWeWorkMarkdown:
We do full kitchen remodels in Seattle ‚Äî anything from full tearouts to just replacing countertops or adding backsplash. RENOVA handles the structure, finishes, plumbing, electrical ‚Äî whatever the project actually needs. Here's how we work:

### üî® Seattle Kitchen Remodel Process

- **üìù In-Home Walkthrough** ‚Äì We stop by, measure the space, and figure out what needs to move (if anything). Electrical panel? Sink? Stove? All gets reviewed up front.  
- **üìê Design Support** ‚Äì If you want layout help, we‚Äôll connect you with someone to draw it up, pick materials, and make sure it all fits right.  
- **üì¶ Materials Prepped** ‚Äì Cabinets, countertops, sinks, lights ‚Äî we order early and store it so we‚Äôre not waiting on delivery mid-job.  
- **üîß Demo & Prep** ‚Äì We rip out the old flooring, backsplash, and cabinets clean. Then check plumbing + electrical before starting fresh.  
- **üöø Rough-In Work** ‚Äì Our licensed team does all the plumbing (sink, faucet, dishwasher, etc) and adds GFCIs, new switches, under-cabinet light wiring, or whatever else is needed.  
- **ü™ö Cabinet & Counter Install** ‚Äì We install custom or prefab cabinets, then drop in the new countertops ‚Äî quartz, granite, marble, you name it.  
- **üß± Tile & Flooring** ‚Äì We do backsplash tile, grout it tight, and lay new flooring (LVP, engineered wood, or tile).  
- **‚úÖ Final Touches** ‚Äì Paint, caulking, trim, appliance hookups. We walk it with you before we call it done.

You don‚Äôt have to do everything. You pick what to update, and we‚Äôll build it right. All up to Seattle code. No guesswork. No delays.

faqItems.question: Do kitchen remodels add value?
faqItems.answer: Yes, kitchen remodels absolutely add value to your home! A minor kitchen remodel costs about $26,214 and returns $18,927 on resale.

faqItems.question: How long does a kitchen remodel take?
faqItems.answer: It will depend on the size and scope of the project, but typically, our kitchen remodels take 2 weeks for small kitchens and 4-5 weeks for large kitchen remodels.

faqItems.question: What type of flooring is suitable for a kitchen?
faqItems.answer: There are various flooring options suitable for kitchens, including tile, hardwood, and laminate. Each has its pros and cons depending on your needs and preferences.

faqItems.question: Should I open up the kitchen to other areas of my home (open concept design)?
faqItems.answer: Open concept designs can make your kitchen feel larger and more connected to the rest of your home. It's a great option if you enjoy entertaining or want a more modern layout.

faqItems.question: Can I repurpose or recycle materials from my old kitchen?
faqItems.answer: Yes, many materials from your old kitchen can be repurposed or recycled. This can be a cost-effective and environmentally friendly option.

faqItems.question: What are the latest kitchen design trends for 2024?
faqItems.answer: The latest trends include bold colors, smart technology, sustainable materials, and multifunctional spaces. Our designers can help you incorporate these trends into your remodel.

faqItems.question: How do I incorporate a breakfast nook into my kitchen design?
faqItems.answer: Incorporating a breakfast nook involves creating a cozy and functional space for casual dining. This can be done with built-in seating, a small table, and strategic use of space.

faqItems.question: What are the benefits of a modern kitchen design?
faqItems.answer: Modern kitchen designs offer sleek aesthetics, improved functionality, and the integration of the latest technology. They can make your kitchen more efficient and visually appealing.

title: Bathroom Remodel Contractors in Seattle, Cost of Bathroom Remodel
description: Bathroom remodels with Renova Contractors LLC on schedule and budget. Free cost estimates with discounts on bathroom fixtures and bathroom tile.

hero.heroP: Renova Contractors LLC handles full-scope bathroom remodeling in Seattle, from layout changes to finish installs. We build walk-in showers with custom shower tile, waterproofed pans, and recessed shower niches for storage üöø. If you want to rework the layout, we relocate plumbing, reframe for new vanities, or move walls as needed. All materials ‚Äî toilets, vanities, flooring, fixtures, shower glass, etc. ‚Äî can be sourced through us at contractor pricing. We install heated bathroom floors üî•, wall-hung vanities, and custom tile surrounds with Schluter waterproofing. Timelines are set upfront, with no change orders unless you ask for them. You‚Äôll get manufacturer warranties on tile, fixtures, and flooring ‚Äî plus our own labor guarantee. Everything‚Äôs built to code, inspected, and handed over clean.
hero.heroPhrase: Some people look for a beautiful place, others make a place beautiful.

about.phrase1: Good design can transform a bathroom from a functional space to a relaxing retreat.
about.phrase2: Every bathroom deserves a touch of elegance and a splash of comfort.
about.priceLine1: Basic Remodel: üöø Update fixtures, vanity, and tile for $15,000-$25,000. A fresh new look on a budget!
about.priceLine2: Luxury Remodel: üõÅ Upgrade with custom finishes, heated floors, and high-end fixtures for $30,000-$50,000+. Create your dream bathroom!
about.image1alt: A modern bathroom remodel featuring a white toilet next to a vanity with a light wood cabinet, black handles, and a white countertop. A wall-mounted mirror above the vanity and a partially open door leading to another room with hardwood flooring complete this sleek remodeling project.
about.image2alt: A modern bathroom remodel features a bathtub with sliding glass doors and blue subway tile walls. Adjacent is a white vanity with a matching sink and a chrome faucet under a large mirror. Shelves and a small window are visible, providing light and storage.
about.sectionP1: Your bathroom is a place to relax and enjoy the quietness of it all. The last thing you want is to fumble through the clutter and hit your elbows on bathroom fixtures. Renova Contractors LLC gives you the option to use all of the space in your bathroom or expand the room itself. Expansion can be costly because extensive architectural and structural changes, along with electrical and plumbing work, are required. Depending on your budget, we can discuss the different options you have.
about.sectionP2: If your budget does not allow for wall relocation, we propose a solution that optimizes the available space in the room. This involves removing your tub and shower combination to create a single walk-in shower, which you can customize to your preferred dimensions. Built-in wall shelves and niches can make the bathroom feel much more open, and if you install a pedestal sink, you're giving it a less cluttered feel. Our interior designer will make sure that the new bathroom layout is functional and optimal. When you want to extend your bathroom beyond its current footprint, we will have our structural engineer consult you on how to best proceed and the project's feasibility. When doing a bathroom remodel, we often change the electrical wiring and the layout of the plumbing pipes, so when doing such an extensive remodel, there will be no problem with the additional wiring and plumbing. Keep in mind that the installation of bathroom tiles heavily depends not only on the square footage, but also on the overall complexity of the tile and its pattern. For example, a small walk-in shower with a complex tile design may cost more than a larger walk-in shower with a simple, pattern-free design. When doing a bathroom remodel, we provide you with a cost sheet that is transparent and very accurate. We pride ourselves on our accuracy with the price, so we can explore different options for the bathroom renovation project.
about.section2H2: Renova Contractors LLC Go-to For Bathroom Remodel
about.section2P1: We are a company that takes a client-centered approach to all of our projects. We provide you with a clear-cut cost sheet and a fantastic warranty. Before the project starts, we provide you with a detailed project schedule that we adhere to vigorously while remaining flexible. Renova Contractors LLC believes in our management style and adherence to deadlines, so we also provide you with a $50 discount for every day that we are behind. We provide you with a variety of discounts and complimentary services, including free consultations with our interior designer and free 3D renderings. Our architect also offers complimentary consultations. Imagine having three professionals working on your bathroom renovation project at all times: an interior designer, an architect, and a project manager. However, we offer even more. At home or on vacation, you can check our video monitoring system we installed with your permission to track the project's progress. You can relax and not worry. Once the designer finalizes the 3D rendering based on your notes and vision, we begin procuring bathroom fixtures such as tubs, faucets, and showerheads. We offer free delivery and always pass on our contractor discount to you.
about.section2P2: Each bathroom renovation project entails electrical and plumbing installation; for all this, our licensed electricians and licensed plumbers pull permits and pass all necessary inspections. Our tile installation team is perfect at making sure that your shower is waterproof and sealed correctly. Before we tile a custom shower, the project manager thoroughly inspects it for water leaks and drainage. You must approve each stage of the bathroom renovation project before we proceed to the next. We keep you updated daily and make sure you are up to date with all the things going on. With an extensive remodel, we also offer our clients a complimentary house cleaning. After you do a final walkthrough of the project with us, we will then provide you with a free house cleaning service as a token of appreciation.

ourServices.paragraph: When it comes to bathrooms, RENOVA handles every part of the job ‚Äî start to finish. We offer bathroom remodeling services in Seattle that cover everything from cabinet installation, vanity replacement, and layout reconfiguration, to full plumbing and electrical rough-ins ‚ö°üöø. Whether you're adding a walk-in shower, a freestanding tub, or reworking the space to include double sinks or a larger linen closet, we build it to code. Most remodels involve detailed tile installation ‚Äî we do shower surrounds, accent walls, floor tile, and backsplashes, with waterproofing systems like Schluter behind every wet zone. Heated floor systems can be installed under tile for added comfort üî•. Every bathroom renovation includes licensed trades and exact planning for lighting, GFCI outlets, drain lines, and venting. You can also request standalone services like floor tile replacement, toilet relocation, or shower glass install ‚Äî our team can break it down piece by piece.

array.heading: Bathroom Remodel
array.paragraph: Remodel your bathroom with experts. Change your layout or do a completely new addition; we have the system down for the best results.

array.heading: Bathroom Layout
array.paragraph: Optimize your bathroom space; don't lose square footage. A change in layout can add more usable square footage to your bathroom.

array.heading: Bathroom Shower

array.paragraph: Bathroom tile installation offers the opportunity to refresh your bathroom without major changes, keeping it simple and elegant.

ourServices.ourServicesMarkdown:
RENOVA Contractors LLC is a licensed bathroom remodeling company in Seattle. We handle full bathroom remodels ‚Äì demo, framing, waterproofing, tile, plumbing, and finish work. Whether it‚Äôs a hallway bath or a full custom primary suite, we manage every part of the job ‚Äì no guesswork, no shortcuts.

### What‚Äôs Included:
- üß∞ **Full demo** ‚Äì Down to studs and subfloor ‚Äì no tiling over old rot or bad board  
- üß± **Waterproofing systems** ‚Äì Schluter KERDI, Wedi, or RedGard ‚Äì all installed to code and flood-tested if required  
- üõÅ **Shower builds** ‚Äì Custom tile showers, pans, benches, niches, and glass ‚Äì slope-checked and vented  
- üîß **Plumbing** ‚Äì Drain, vent, and supply moved or upgraded ‚Äì UPC compliant  
- ‚ö° **Electrical** ‚Äì GFCI outlets, lighting, fan circuits ‚Äì updated per NEC with full grounding  
- ü™µ **Vanities & tops** ‚Äì Plywood vanities, quartz or stone tops, under-mount sinks  
- üß± **Tile install** ‚Äì Floors, walls, base, trim ‚Äì grouted and sealed  
- üßΩ **Paint, doors, trim** ‚Äì Moisture-rated drywall, clean paint lines, casing, and baseboard  
- üöΩ **Toilet, fixtures, accessories** ‚Äì Installed level, pressure-tested, caulked, and clean

We also include free interior design support for layout, tile choices, fixtures, and lighting. **Permits are pulled with the City of Seattle**, and we handle every inspection.

If you're searching for a dependable bathroom remodel contractor in Seattle, or comparing Seattle bathroom remodel companies, **RENOVA Contractors LLC** builds clean, builds tight, and gets it done right. ‚úÖüìêüõ†Ô∏è

manufacturers.p: Renova Contractors LLC highlights the importance of great products, especially when it comes to plumbing fixtures in the bathroom, since this is the last place you want something to go wrong. We work with several manufacturers, like Moen, Delta, Grohe, and Kohler, among many others, who have proven that their products are of high quality and durable against frequent usage.
manufacturers.markdownmanufacturers:
We remodel bathrooms across Seattle and take care of the materials too ‚Äî so you don‚Äôt have to shop around or guess what fits. We use suppliers we trust and install everything ourselves üëá

### ü™û Vanities & Storage

- **ProCraft**, **Luban**, and **Bellmont** ‚Äì Quality vanities with soft-close drawers, smooth finishes, and solid build.  
- **Golden Home** ‚Äì Budget-friendly storage options like floating shelves and extra cabinets that still look clean.  

### üß± Bathroom Tile Options

- **United Tile** ‚Äì Affordable **ceramic tile** for floors and walls (starts around $2.99/sq. ft.).  
- **Daltile** ‚Äì Great for **slate floors** or **wood-look tile** that works in wet areas.  
- **CFM** ‚Äì Classic **subway tile** with a glossy finish ‚Äî easy to clean.  
- **Statements Tile** ‚Äì If you want something bold or modern for the shower wall or a niche.  

### üöø Fixtures & Details

- **Ferguson** ‚Äì Sinks, faucets, and shower heads in **matte black**, **brushed nickel**, or whatever finish you want.  
- **Schluter** ‚Äì For **heated bathroom floors** and waterproofing under tile ‚Äî we use it on almost every job.  

### üîß Install & Warranty

- We install everything: **vanities**, **tile**, **toilets**, **floor heat**, **lighting**, and more ‚Äî no third parties.  
- Materials are ordered ahead so we‚Äôre not waiting. If it's in stock, we usually start in **under 3 days**.  
- Every job comes with a **2-year warranty on labor** and longer guarantees on most materials.

If you're doing a bathroom remodel in Seattle ‚Äî full or small ‚Äî we‚Äôll build it right, and you won‚Äôt have to chase parts or fix stuff after.

howWeWork.howWeWorkMarkdown:
At RENOVA, we approach each **bathroom remodel** like a construction project ‚Äî not a cosmetic upgrade. Everything is planned around your space, your fixtures, and actual code requirements in Seattle üõ†Ô∏è. No guesswork, no ‚Äúwe‚Äôll figure it out later.‚Äù Here‚Äôs how we work:

### üîç Step-by-Step Process

- **üë£ Site Visit** ‚Äì We take measurements, and assess plumbing, framing, electrical, and ventilation.  
- **üìê Scope & Planning** ‚Äì You pick materials or we help you select; we finalize layout, rough-in locations, and fixture specs.  
- **üì¶ Material Prep** ‚Äì We order all major items: tile, vanities, fixtures, toilets, glass, and store them until demo.  
- **üß± Demo & Rough-In** ‚Äì Old surfaces removed. We reroute plumbing and wiring as needed; install backing for wall-hung items.  
- **üßØ Waterproofing & Tile** ‚Äì We prep wet areas using waterproofing membrane and install tile (floor, shower, walls).  
- **üöø Fixture Install** ‚Äì Everything goes in: toilet, vanity, tub, shower glass, mirrors, lighting.  
- **üßΩ Final Touches** ‚Äì Paint, caulking, trim, and final walkthrough.  

Everything is built to code, clean, and made to last ‚Äî no shortcuts.

faqItems.question: What is the typical timeline for a bathroom remodel?
faqItems.answer: The timeline for a bathroom remodel can vary depending on the scope of the project. On average, a complete bathroom remodel can take 2-4 weeks from start to finish and heavily depends on what layout changes you want to make. .

faqItems.question: Do I need to move out during the bathroom remodel?
faqItems.answer: In most cases, you do not need to move out during a bathroom remodel. Our team works efficiently to minimize disruption to your daily life. However, there may be times when the bathroom is inaccessible for short periods.

faqItems.question: What are the latest trends in bathroom design?
faqItems.answer: Some of the latest trends in bathroom design include the use of natural materials, such as wood and stone, walk-in showers with frameless glass doors, and smart bathroom technology like touchless faucets and smart mirrors.

faqItems.question: How do I choose the right bathroom fixtures?
faqItems.answer: Choosing the right bathroom fixtures involves considering both functionality and style. Our design team can help you select fixtures that meet your needs and complement your overall bathroom design.

faqItems.question: What should I consider when planning a bathroom layout?
faqItems.answer: When planning a bathroom layout, consider factors like the placement of plumbing fixtures, storage needs, and the flow of the space. Maximizing natural light and ensuring easy access to essential items are also important.

warrantySection.imageAlt: Completed bathroom renovation with pedestal sink
warrantySection.phrase: The bathroom is the most personal room in the house, a space that reflects your style and needs.
warrantySection.paragraph1: We offer a very comprehensive warranty that covers all of the work that has been performed in your brand-new bathroom. Furthermore, we make it a point to provide solace and reassurance not just during the course of our project but also after it has been completed. Because of this, we provide a complete warranty for bathroom renovations. Regarding the standard warranty for the bathroom, kindly refer to the PDF file that has been included below.
warrantySection.paragraph2: Every single one of the products that we purchase comes with a warranty directly from the manufacturer. During the process of sourcing your materials, make sure that the warranty part is thoroughly examined. For people who are in need of assistance, Renova Contractors LLC is available to provide advice in selecting the suitable manufacturers for their bathroom fixtures.
warrantySection.price: Price depends on the scope of the project
